author: Good Enough
description:
In 1957, a fire broke out at the Windscale nuclear facility in northwest England, releasing radioactive gases across towns and countryside. The British government destroyed contaminated milk, censored reports, and kept the full truth hidden for over 30 years. This was one of the worst nuclear accidents in history and almost no one knew.

#Windscale #NuclearDisaster #HiddenHistory #Radiation #BritishHistory #Shorts #DidYouKnow #CoverUp #AtomicEnergy #YouTubeShorts
title: The Windscale Fire Incident 🔥 😰 #facts #didyouknow #documentary #hiddenhistory #nuclear
